channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Man faces federal charge in killing of Ukrainian woman on Charlotte train
item.description: The Justice Department has charged a man with the fatal stabbing of a Ukrainian refugee on a North Carolina commuter train.

item.title: South Korea sends plane to US to bring back workers detained in immigration raid
This California town was ravaged by a wildfire. Seven years later, schools are still recovering
